co.lqnt.lockbox.util

Interface PublicKeyInformationFactoryInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PublicKeyInformationFactory

    public interface PublicKeyInformationFactoryInterface
    The interface implemented by Bouncy Castle public key information factories.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.SubjectPublicKeyInfo create(org.bouncycastle.crypto.params.RSAKeyParameters keyParameters)
      Create a Bouncy Castle public key information instance.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.SubjectPublicKeyInfo create(org.bouncycastle.crypto.params.RSAKeyParameters keyParameters)
                                                       throws IOException
        Create a Bouncy Castle public key information instance.
        Parameters:
        keyParameters - The Bouncy Castle public key parameters.
        Returns:
        The Bouncy Castle public key information.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the key cannot be converted.
